message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You started high, I'll try to get a better deal now!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with too much!
You're not giving me enough, I'll try to squeeze more out of this deal!
You're really pushing your luck, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with the whole pie!
